title:
Prescribing negative curvature with cusps and conical singularities on
  compact surface
authors: Jingyi Chen, Yuxiang Li, Yunqing Wu
abstract:
On a compact surface, we prove existence and uniqueness of the conformal
metric whose curvature is prescribed by a negative function away from finitely
many points where the metric has prescribed angles presenting cusps or conical
singularities.
